IsChangeCameraWhenPathChange.description: Resets the camera upon changing paths.

Target.description: ID of the reaction plate to send the player towards upon winning the QTE.

Type.description: Prompt displayed by the plate. 0: Blue spring 1: B 2: A 3: X 4: Y 5: End Point 6: Question Mark (Random)

m_FailOutOfControlTime.description: Time taken before restoring control to the player after failing the prompt.

Extra.name: A spring/panel which launches the player to another reaction plate, provided they win the Quick Time Event.
